Title: Wimbledon
Overview: British tennis player Peter clutches to an embarrassingly low position on the tennis-ranking ladder. Handed a wild card for Wimbledon, he expects it to be his final bow.
Tagline: She's the golden girl. He's the longshot. It's a match made in...
Cast: Kirsten Dunst, Paul Bettany, Sam Neill
